application_information.description: Shop100 Merchant is a platform that allows users to create and manage their stores. It provides a centralized dashboard for managing all aspects of their business operations.
application_information.about_this_app:
Shop100 Merchant is a platform that allows users to create and manage their stores. It provides a centralized dashboard for managing all aspects of their business operations. 
  Key Features: 
 - **Store Creation and Management**: Easily create and manage your stores. 
 - **Enhanced User Interface**: Enjoy a smooth and engaging user experience. 
 - **Secure Transactions**: Improved security features to protect merchant data and ensure safe transactions. 
 For more information or support, visit the [Shop100 Merchant Help Center](https://shop100.co/help) or contact Shop100 support at [support@shop100.co](mailto:support@shop100.co).
application_information.required_os: Android 6.0> or iOS 12.0> or Web Browser
